name: Escape Job
description:
Hey, I have a job for you!

You need to find 20 very expensive objects hidden in different rooms. The hard part is that all those rooms are carefully locked so you need to use your escape skills!
This escape game has the classical room escape structure which means you need to pick locks, break codes, solve puzzles and use outside of the box thinking in order to find your way out.

If you believe you have what it takes to finish the job then download this game now and prove it!

Features:
↗ Catchy puzzles!
↗ Fantastic graphics!
↗ Thrilling atmosphere!
↗ 100% room escape game!
